item.typemoonworld.avalon.desc: Sheath of Utopia... Isolates harm and protects the wielder.
item.typemoonworld.excalibur.desc: The legendary Holy Sword... Symbol of the King, turns light into slash.
item.typemoonworld.excalibur2.desc: Sword of Selection... When held by the rightful king, its certain victory shines.
item.typemoonworld.mystic_eyes_of_death_: Mystic Eyes of Death Perception (Noble Colour)
item.typemoonworld.temple_stone_sword_ax: Weapon of the ancient temple... Stone and blade as one, ritual tool and weapon alike.
item.typemoonworld.tsumukari_muramasa.wa: A mortal body cannot bear a God-forged weapon...

gui.typemoonworld.leyline_map.hint: Move cursor over cells for details
gui.typemoonworld.leyline_map.title: Leyline Survey Map
gui.typemoonworld.mode_switcher.title: Magic Mode Switcher
gui.typemoonworld.projection.title: Analysis - Projection Library
gui.typemoonworld.structure.confirm.subt: Press ESC to return to previous selection step
gui.typemoonworld.structure.delete.title: Delete this structure?
gui.typemoonworld.structure.naming.subti: Enter a name and save to your personal projection data
gui.typemoonworld.structure.naming.title: Name This Structure
magic.typemoonworld.broken_phantasm.desc:
Fires a projected Noble Phantasm as an arrow,
causing a massive mana explosion.
magic.typemoonworld.broken_phantasm.name: Broken Phantasm
magic.typemoonworld.cyan_throw.name: Cyan Throw
magic.typemoonworld.cyan_wind.name: Cyan Wind
magic.typemoonworld.emerald_use.name: Emerald Use
Cyan (Storm Wind):
Throw 3 Cyan gems within 2 seconds.
If the last one hits the ground, it becomes a tornado.

After learning, unlocks gem engraving and combo mechanics.
Using same-color gems within 2 seconds triggers combo.

Emerald (Winter River):
Trigger by throwing 2 upward within 2 seconds.

Ruby has no separate advanced spell.
Throwing 3 Rubies within 2 seconds is the advanced expression itself.

Sapphire (Winter Frost):
Trigger by throwing 3 upward within 2 seconds.

Topaz (Triple Reinforce):
Trigger by throwing 3 upward within 2 seconds.
magic.typemoonworld.jewel_magic_shoot.cy:
Cyan (Throw):
Consumes a Full Mana Cyan Gemstone to throw,
creating an area wind field.
magic.typemoonworld.jewel_magic_shoot.de:
After learning, Shift+Right Click stores or withdraws mana from gems.
Right Click gem usage does not require learning status.
magic.typemoonworld.jewel_magic_shoot.em:
Emerald (Deploy):
Consumes a Full Mana Emerald,
creating a shield in front to block attacks.
magic.typemoonworld.jewel_magic_shoot.ra:
Random (Throw):
Randomly throws any Full Mana Gem.
Non-Ruby explosions are weaker.
magic.typemoonworld.jewel_magic_shoot.ru:
Ruby (Throw):
Consumes a Full Mana Ruby to throw,
causing explosion damage to hit enemies.
magic.typemoonworld.jewel_magic_shoot.sa:
Sapphire (Throw):
Consumes a Full Mana Sapphire to throw,
freezing hit enemies.
magic.typemoonworld.jewel_magic_shoot.to:
Topaz (Throw):
Consumes a Full Mana Topaz to throw,
dealing damage with special effects.
magic.typemoonworld.gravity_magic.name: Gravity Magic
magic.typemoonworld.gravity_magic.desc:
Tiered gravity magic.
Press C to shift one tier up, Shift+C to shift one tier down.
Applies Ultra Light/Light/Normal/Heavy/Ultra Heavy to self or target.
magic.typemoonworld.projection.desc:
Projects analyzed items using mana.
Mana cost depends on item rarity and complexity.
magic.typemoonworld.projection.desc.0:
Basic Projection:
Projects a single item.
magic.typemoonworld.projection.name: Projection Magic
magic.typemoonworld.reinforcement.desc:
Basic Reinforcement Magic.
Injects mana into objects or body to enhance performance.
Can reinforce self, others, or held items.
magic.typemoonworld.reinforcement.name: Reinforcement Magic
magic.typemoonworld.reinforcement_item.d:
Reinforces held item.
Increases durability/sharpness/mining speed etc.
Reinforces target entity's capabilities.
Must look at target.
Mode: Body/Arm/Leg/Eye
magic.typemoonworld.reinforcement_self.d:
Reinforces own physical capabilities.
Mode: Body/Arm/Leg/Eye
magic.typemoonworld.ruby_throw.name: Ruby Throw
magic.typemoonworld.sapphire_throw.name: Sapphire Throw
Analyzes held item or targeted block/entity.
Successful analysis allows projection.
magic.typemoonworld.sword_barrel_full_op:
Fully opens the Sword Barrel for continuous projection.
Mode 0: AOE Rain
Mode 1: Aimed Rain
Mode 2: Focused Rain
Mode 3: Clear Swords

Trace On... Sword Barrel Full Open!
Project and fire all weapons from the Unlimited Blade Works.
magic.typemoonworld.topaz_throw.name: Topaz Throw
magic.typemoonworld.unlimited_blade_work:
Reality Marble: Unlimited Blade Works.
The materialization of one's inner world.

I am the bone of my sword.
Steel is my body, and fire is my blood.
I have created over a thousand blades.
Unaware of loss.
Nor aware of gain.
Withstood pain to create weapons,waiting for one's arrival.
I have no regrets. 
This is the only path.
My whole life was,
——【Unlimited Blade Works】
message.typemoonworld.avalon.no_saber_ma: §cMissing Saber's mana. Avalon cannot be activated.
message.typemoonworld.awaken.hint: §bYou feel a faint surge of mana... Press §eX §fto awaken your magic circuits.
message.typemoonworld.awaken.missing_cat: §cYou have not obtained a magical catalyst yet.
message.typemoonworld.awaken.success: §bMagic circuits connected. You are now a magus.
message.typemoonworld.broken_phantasm.no: No projected item or Noble Phantasm in hand.
message.typemoonworld.circuit.forced_clo: Magic circuits forcibly closed due to overload!
message.typemoonworld.gem.convert_health: §cNot enough mana. Consumed %s health to compensate.
message.typemoonworld.gem.use.empty: This gem has no mana stored.
message.typemoonworld.gem.storage.locked: Learn Basic Jewel Magic first to store/withdraw gem mana.
message.typemoonworld.gem.engrave.locked: Learn Advanced Jewel Magic before engraving gems.
message.typemoonworld.gem.engrave.magic_: You have not learned this magic, so it cannot be engraved.
message.typemoonworld.gem.engrave.capaci: Required mana %s exceeds this gem capacity (%s).
message.typemoonworld.gem.engrave.need_g: Place exactly one unengraved carved gem in the table.
message.typemoonworld.gem.engrave.projec: No projection item selected. Choose an analyzed item first.
No projection structure selected. Choose a saved structure first.
message.typemoonworld.gem.engrave.need_t: Use the Gem Carving Table to engrave magic onto gems.
Place a Chisel in the table tool slot first.
message.typemoonworld.gem.engrave.no_mag: Select a learned magic first for engraving.
message.typemoonworld.gem.engrave.not_su: Supported engraving magics: Gravity / Reinforcement / Projection.
message.typemoonworld.gem.engrave.single: Place an unengraved carved gem in the table.
Stored projection structure is missing or unavailable.
Engraved Gravity launched: creates a gravity field on impact.
The held gem is not engraved with Gravity Magic.
message.typemoonworld.gem_echo.found: A geode echo ripples through nearby stone.
message.typemoonworld.gem_mist.haste: Crystal mist hums: your hands move faster.
message.typemoonworld.gem_mist.slow: Crystal mist crackles: your swing grows heavy.
message.typemoonworld.leyline_map.no_loa: Leyline survey failed: no loaded chunks available in current range.
message.typemoonworld.leyline_map.scanne: Leyline survey complete: sampled %s chunks and opened the map.
message.typemoonworld.magic.gravity.no_t: No valid target for gravity magic.
message.typemoonworld.magic.not_learned: You have not learned this magic yet.
message.typemoonworld.magic.reinforcemen: This target was not reinforced by you
Item is in perfect condition, no reinforcement needed.
Reinforcement had no effect (Full durability and no upgrade needed)
message.typemoonworld.mana.health_conver: Insufficient Mana. Consumed %s HP instead of %s Mana.
message.typemoonworld.mana_survey_compas: Survey area reached. The needle is now spinning erratically (Concentration %s).
Warning: very high concentration area reached. The needle is spinning erratically! (Concentration %s).
Survey malfunction: current area concentration is already high (%s).
Survey complete: high mana area locked around X~%s, Z~%s (Concentration %s).
Survey failed: no area with concentration above %s in current range.
message.typemoonworld.not_magus_interact: You cannot understand this item's construction and cannot use it.
message.typemoonworld.projection.cannot_: Projected items cannot be used for crafting
Projected items cannot be ground or disenchanted
Projected items cannot be repaired or reinforced
message.typemoonworld.projection.structu: Build area cleared. Constructing layer by layer.
Position locked. Press C again to start projection build.
Structure preview started. Scroll to rotate, press C to lock position.
message.typemoonworld.reinforcement.leve: Reinforcement level is already too high.
message.typemoonworld.scroll.already_lea: You have already learned all magics in this scroll.
message.typemoonworld.structural_analysi: Analysis failed, structure unknown. Mana partially consumed.
[Analysis Selection] Step 1/3: Aim to define a face line, then press C.
[Analysis Selection] Step 2/3: Aim to pull depth and form a volume, then press C.
[Analysis Selection] Confirm pending. Choose Yes/No or press ESC to go back.
message.typemoonworld.structure.enter_na: Enter a name for this structure
message.typemoonworld.structure.saved: Structure saved: %s | Mana Cost: %s | New analyzed: %s
message.typemoonworld.unlimited_blade_wo: I am the bone of my sword...?
§bI am the bone of my sword.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.attac: §7[Merlin] This is actually one of my specialties.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.avalo: §7[Merlin] Avalon isn't a place you can come and go as you please.
§7[Merlin] Footsteps outside Avalon, please learn to look back first.
§7[Merlin] A sky with no walls, no castle, no kingdom... I'll show you the rest next time.
§7[Merlin] From the edge of paradise, let me tell you: your story is full of blessings.
§7[Merlin] Only the sinless may pass. 'The Everdistant Utopia'!
§b[Merlin] The Inner Sea of the Planet. The Tower of Observation.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.buff_: §b[Merlin] Advance. I'll cover stamina, you provide output.
§b[Merlin] Don't rush. Keep pace and we'll win by endurance.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.cherr: §7[Merlin] Cherry blossom blizzard, suitable for a beginning, and an end.
§7[Merlin] Cherry blossoms don't answer, but they always give the most beautiful ending.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.clone: §7[Merlin] Performance over, flowers scatter, people leave.
§7[Merlin] A double appears—don't mistake the actor.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.comba: §7[Merlin] This attack is ineffective against Avalon.
§7[Merlin] Lovely fireworks. Shame about the damage.
§7[Merlin] Even if the world is destroyed, it is absolutely safe here.
§7[Merlin] Don't waste your energy.
§7[Merlin] Be a little quieter.
§7[Merlin] It's not over yet.
§7[Merlin] Hitting Avalon is basically punching the concept of 'no'.
§7[Merlin] Strong force. Entirely wrong direction.
§7[Merlin] Sorry, this barrier doesn't take feedback.
§7[Merlin] Keep trying. You're getting very familiar with 'ineffective'.
§7[Merlin] Just a clone... I'll leave the rest to you.
§7[Merlin] Next time, I'll bring worse jokes.
§7[Merlin] Retreat, retreat...
§7[Merlin] See you next time.
§7[Merlin] I'm going back to the tower to sleep.
§7[Merlin] Is this it?
§7[Merlin] Don't get proud. I never appear only once in a story.
§7[Merlin] A curtain call, not the ending.
§7[Merlin] Nicely done. Enjoy your restless night.
§7[Merlin] Remember this moment. You'll miss me soon enough.
§7[Merlin] Hah.
§7[Merlin] Good work. Let us continue to the next act.
§7[Merlin] How is that?
§7[Merlin] Take this!
§7[Merlin] This is where I excel.
§7[Merlin] No worries, consider it a bonus.
§7[Merlin] Hah! Haah!
§7[Merlin] Not exactly my style, though...
§7[Merlin] Then I'll be serious.
§7[Merlin] You're rather rough.
§7[Merlin] Trying to knock me down? My stamina lasts longer than you think.
§7[Merlin] I took a detour. Stamina remains full.
§7[Merlin] That fall means little. I can continue.
§7[Merlin] I'm back. Continue.
§7[Merlin] Don't expect me to tire first.
§7[Merlin] Focus. I'm not ending this yet.
§7[Merlin] Only my altitude dropped, not my condition.
§7[Merlin] Not the end. Just halftime.
§7[Merlin] Position corrected. Fight continues.
§7[Merlin] Don't celebrate yet. The result isn't in.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.crowd: §7[Merlin] A crowd is convenient. I can explain this once.
§7[Merlin] More people makes it easier to judge who falls first.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.death: §c[Merlin] Retreat, retreat... I'll leave the rest to you.
§c[Merlin] I really was no help. Sorry about that...
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.envir: §7[Merlin] Hmm... The soil here isn't suitable for flowers.
§7[Merlin] Night is a good time for flowers to bloom.
§7[Merlin] The night favors petals—and they will favor you.
§7[Merlin] Nothingness... It's quite close to the 'ideal' skeleton.
§7[Merlin] The thunder is too loud; it can't suppress the scent of flowers.
§7[Merlin] Thunder is just noise, the scent of flowers is the star.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.giveu: §7[Merlin] Good work. We'll stop here and continue the journey.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.greet: §7[Merlin] As you wish. Let us speak of the king's tale.
§7[Merlin] There is a tiny window here.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.guard: §b[Merlin] Looks like it's my turn to take the stage.
§b[Merlin] The curtain rises—the sea of flowers is today's stage.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.heale: §7[Merlin] Hmm, good—the flowers can bloom a bit longer now.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.hosti: §c[Merlin] What a rude guest—let's show some real skill.
§c[Merlin] Plenty of aggression, none of it accurate.
§c[Merlin] You're reaching Avalon slower than you're reaching your grave.
§c[Merlin] Fine. Leave your confidence here, you can go home.
§c[Merlin] Politeness first—otherwise the flowers won't be happy.
§c[Merlin] With that attitude, even petals avoid you.
§c[Merlin] Mistaking impulse for strength? I'll teach that one for free.
§c[Merlin] Learn to look where you're going before swinging at me.
§c[Merlin] You think you're challenging Merlin. You're challenging common sense.
§c[Merlin] Tragic. You're this enthusiastic about losing.
§c[Merlin] Keep charging. I could use the entertainment.
§c[Merlin] Be polite and I might be gentle.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.idle: §7[Merlin] Move when timing is right. Wait when it isn't.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.idle_: §7[Merlin] Be patient. Good endings rarely rush.
§7[Merlin] Avalon isn't far. Most people just pick the wrong direction.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.invis: §7[Merlin] Invisibility? I prefer showing my face.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.kill_: §7[Merlin] Hmm... Privilege of the creator? Let's stop here.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.low_h: §c[Merlin] Ah... It's been a while since proper exercise.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.menta: §7[Merlin] A little touch of the mind, don't be afraid.
§7[Merlin] Don't be afraid, it's just a dream reminding you: you can be gentler.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.merli: §7[Merlin] I tell the joke first, then the conclusion. Both work.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.moon: §7[Merlin] The moon is perfect for weaving a little miracle.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.playe: §7[Merlin] Looking at the flowers or me? Either is fine.
§7[Merlin] Looking at me, or the flowers? Why not both.
§c[Merlin] Don't push yourself. Only the living can dream.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.prank: §c[Merlin] Who told you to be so rude to flowers?
§c[Merlin] Those who oppose flowers usually don't get applause.
§7[Merlin] A little prank, take it as a refresher.
§7[Merlin] A little joke, makes the flowers bloom better.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.rain: §7[Merlin] Rainy days aren't bad; the flowers look brighter.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.see_a: §b[Merlin] The primordial star shines in the depths below. Shall I show you where souls return?
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.see_b: §7[Merlin] Sleep, sleep. There's a ticket to Avalon in your dreams.
§7[Merlin] There is a sea of flowers in the dream, don't forget to smile when you wake up.
§7[Merlin] Want the longer version? I'm rather good at telling stories.
§7[Merlin] Look through that little window and the story will unfold on its own.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.see_c: §7[Merlin] Gems can speak—if you are willing to listen.
§7[Merlin] Polish carefully, dreams also need details.
§7[Merlin] Time is a good friend—and a good joke.
§7[Merlin] Time is a good friend, and a good excuse.
§7[Merlin] Pointing where? To a beautiful place, of course.
§7[Merlin] Where it points, isn't as good as where the heart points.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.see_e: §b[Merlin] The Sword of the King—flowers will make way for it.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.see_f: §7[Merlin] Cherry blossoms? Yes, that's my specialty.
§7[Merlin] Look, flowers always respond at the most appropriate time.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.see_h: §7[Merlin] The holy shroud covers, but also makes the story gentler.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.see_m: §7[Merlin] Scrolls are just signposts, you decide the scenery.
§7[Merlin] You don't need a map to Avalon, just your heart.
§7[Merlin] Roads not on the map often have better scenery.
§7[Merlin] The one forging the blade is also forging fate.
§c[Merlin] Be careful, those eyes will cut the 'story' too clean.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.see_r: §7[Merlin] Pick one, flowers never mind surprises.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.see_s: §7[Merlin] A shield is good. It still can't make decisions for you.
§7[Merlin] Retreat when needed. Only the living get a next strike.
§7[Merlin] Fine sword. The hand must be steadier.
§7[Merlin] Fine blade, yes. More important: can you keep swinging to the end?
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.sleep: §c[Merlin] Have a restless dream, a small lesson.
§b[Merlin] Have a sweet dream, the flowers will keep watch.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.suppo: §b[Merlin] Hold a steady pace. I'll stretch this fight in your favor.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.targe: §7[Merlin] Cute—but don't eat the flowers.
§c[Merlin] A big boss entrance? I'll turn the stage lights up.
§c[Merlin] The bigger they are, the funnier the fall.
§c[Merlin] You handle the roaring. I'll handle the ending.
§c[Merlin] Heavy crown, isn't it? Let me help you bow.
§c[Merlin] A legendary foe? Perfect for a legendary sea of flowers.
§c[Merlin] Easy now. Epic battles usually end on my cue.
§7[Merlin] Explosions? I can do that too. Let me show you a rain of flowers.
§7[Merlin] Explosion is rough art, flowers are a refined counterattack.
§c[Merlin] Yo, a legend. Let's have a legendary sea of flowers.
§7[Merlin] Teleportation? Mine is more elegant.
§7[Merlin] I'm more familiar with 'elegant movement'.
§7[Merlin] The more the merrier; a flower banquet is livelier with a crowd.
§7[Merlin] Even iron blocks can be softened by flowers—metaphorically speaking.
§7[Merlin] Nightmares of the sky... let's decorate with some petals.
§c[Merlin] Drawing your blade at me? Brave choice, poor judgment.
§c[Merlin] You picked me as your final boss? Better save often.
§c[Merlin] Relax. I'll let you lose with dignity.
§c[Merlin] Nice killing intent. Shame about aim and manners.
§c[Merlin] Want me to stand still? You'd still miss.
§c[Merlin] Are you trying to beat me, or your own temper?
§c[Merlin] Come on, let's see if your protagonist aura is still subscribed.
§c[Merlin] Excellent, another one who mistakes advice for provocation.
§7[Merlin] Bones... lacking warmth and romance.
§7[Merlin] Bones need some warmth—like a rain of flowers.
§7[Merlin] Threads weaving a web, while I weave dreams.
§7[Merlin] Sending summons first? Hiding behind them already?
§7[Merlin] Borrowed minions can't borrow you a victory.
§7[Merlin] You summon them, I dismiss them.
§7[Merlin] Letting pets take hits for you? Very responsible.
§7[Merlin] Off you go, little one. Tell your master the plan failed.
§7[Merlin] Great quantity. Quality remains negotiable.
§7[Merlin] Business is good. Avalon offers no discounts and no credit.
§7[Merlin] A colleague? No, I am the Magus of Flowers.
§c[Merlin] Hmm... this smell doesn't suit my flowers.
§7[Merlin] Walking memories. Let me give you some rest.
§7[Merlin] Old dreams unawakened—let it sleep again.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.telep: §7[Merlin] I'm good at closing distance, and better at winning there.
§7[Merlin] Distance is not a problem for me.
§7[Merlin] The scenery changed, the mood should keep up.
entity.typemoonworld.merlin.speech.trace: §b[Merlin] Trace... no, I'd rather win directly.
entity.typemoonworld.ryougi_shiki.speech: §c[Ryougi Shiki] Do you have nothing better to do?
§c[Ryougi Shiki] That's enough.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Keep doing that and I'll cut you.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Hardness is not the issue, as long as I cut that 'point'...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] ...I see.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] (Ignores you)
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Cherry blossoms... a scene fitting for parting.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Too many people...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Small fry... so many of them.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Is this... the sensation of death...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] What a... boring ending...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Even I... cannot escape the end...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] SHIKI... I'm sorry...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Consciousness... is fading...
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Too slow.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Hmph.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] The air here, full of rot and sulfur.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Night... suitable for walking, and also for killing.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] 'Void'... there is nothing here, only the end.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Noisy sounds... really annoying.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Tch... Trying to trap me with this?
§7[Ryougi Shiki] ...Not bad.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Hmph... Thanks.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] That's enough.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Backing off... for now.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Water... I don't like the feel of it.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Meddling... but, thanks.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] The obstacle has been removed.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] This level... isn't enough to kill me.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Noble Phantasm...? It does hurt a bit.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Boring... isn't there anything worth cutting?
§c[Ryougi Shiki] §4Running is useless.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] §4As long as it's alive, even a god can be killed.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Left arm... is gone...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] The prosthetic... is it broken...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Don't stare.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] This feeling... I'm not used to it.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Even with one hand, I can still kill you.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] It hurts... just kidding.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Need a new prosthetic...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] This is a bit... troublesome.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Touko is going to complain again...
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Balance... is slightly off.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] ...Tch.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] This thing... can't replace Touko's work.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Don't touch that... I'm not used to it yet.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Even without this hand, I can still see the lines of death.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] It feels empty... and a bit cold.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Want to help?... No need.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] ...Tch.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Time... means nothing to me.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] This feeling... I'm not used to it.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Even with one hand, I can still kill you.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Tsk... balance is slightly off.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Prosthetic broken... Touko is going to complain again.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Pain... is it also a proof of living?
§7[Ryougi Shiki] The moon tonight... is beautiful.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Who's next?
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Don't block the way!
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Thought I couldn't see you? ...As long as you exist, there are lines.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] What are you looking at? Is there something on my face?
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Hey, look at you... you're dying.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Rain... even this weather can't wash away the smell of blood.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] §4...Refused.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] My fate... I decide it.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Brute force... meaningless.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] I've seen the Root, what is this Void?
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Retrieved.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Retrieved.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Apple... reminds me of some things.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Apple... red always reminds me of blood.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Dreams... are also a reality.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Books... I'm not interested in complex theories.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] ...Waiting for someone?
§7[Ryougi Shiki] What time is it?... Never mind.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] I decide my own direction.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Flowers... will eventually wither.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Empty... just like something.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] ...Are you implying I'm cold?
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Lost? Don't count on me.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Lost?... I'm not responsible for guiding.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] ...What do you think I am?
§7[Ryougi Shiki] This kind of charm means nothing to me.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Cutting with this? ...Don't joke around.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] As long as it's alive, there is no absolute defense.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Useless... as long as it's alive, I can kill it.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Peace that only belongs to the dead.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] (Stares for a moment)... Boring.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Even with a famous blade, it depends on the wielder.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] A sword... as long as it's sharp, it's enough.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Water... I don't dislike it.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Everything has cracks... I can see them clearly.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Animals... I'm not interested in taking care of pets.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] A grand existence... let me see if I can kill it.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Want to explode? I already see the fuse.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Phantasmal Species... is this a so-called dragon? Wonder how it feels to cut it.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Teleportation won't save you from 'Death'.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Gathering together just makes cleaning up easier.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Even if invisible, the lines of death cannot be hidden.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Even a body made of iron has flaws.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] A nightmare in the sky? I'll cut your wings off.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Bones without life... I'll cut the strings.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Amorphous... but the core is clearly visible.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Too many legs, disgusting.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Even spirits have lines of death.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Ordinary people... better stay away from me, you'll get hurt.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Magic is just another system, if it has a form, I can kill it.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] A collection of death... messy, but killable.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Living corpse... how boring.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Take this!
§c[Ryougi Shiki] Don't even think about running!
§c[Ryougi Shiki] §4—I see it!
§c[Ryougi Shiki] §4Chokushi (Mystic Eyes)...
§7[Ryougi Shiki] The atmosphere here... is wrong.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] A crude trap.
§7[Ryougi Shiki] Whatever it is, if it's an obstacle, I'll cut it.
§c[Ryougi Shiki] §4The concept of death... this kind of thing doesn't work on me.
